subs.text: May 2022
subs.name: may2022

subs.text: May 24

I recently finished watching The Lincoln Lawyer on Netflix. It’s a good, bingeworthy series. Nothing’s great about it, but if all one wants is to binge a show over the weekend, this is one option. The things keep moving. No performance is painful, no side-story unbearable.

subs.text: May 23

I recently got to know (h/t Gabriel) that “On This Day” feature doesn’t work with the Paper theme. I fixed the issue – the micro memories should load properly now. I have also fixed a few minor styling issues. The upgrade should be available in the ... [link]

subs.text: I want you to know that most of your life will happen in the gray spaces between bliss and heartbreak, between having everything lock into place and having it all fall apart. That’s where the grace is. Source: Laura Dern writes to her teenage daughter → [link]
subs.rawText:
I want you to know that most of your life will happen in the gray spaces between bliss and heartbreak, between having everything lock into place and having it all fall apart. That’s where the grace is.

Source: Laura Dern writes to her teenage daughter → https://t.co/hkCSCx5wJ0

subs.text: I have been traveling for the past week – rejuvenating myself amidst the nature. Relaxing on the beach. Had some wonderful rides, surrounded by dense jungles. Most of all, untouched by all the hustle bustle of the modern life. Wonder. Amazement. Serenity. [link]
subs.rawText: I have been traveling for the past week – rejuvenating myself amidst the nature. Relaxing on the beach. Had some wonderful rides, surrounded by dense jungles. Most of all, untouched by all the hustle bustle of the modern life. Wonder. Amazement. Serenity. https://t.co/kptC82IVDj
